summary: Whenever I make a mod by request, I will upload it here.
descriptionHtml:
This is a hub for all mods which I make by request.

[b]Mod #1 - [i]Escort's Aegis[/i][/b]

Requested by Branwhin. Includes five Alteration spells, all available for sell by Tolfdir at the College of Winterhold.

1. [u]Escort's Aegis (Apprentice)[/u] - Increases the target's armor by 60 for 60 seconds.
2. [u]Escort's Aegis (Adept)[/u] - Increases the target's armor by 80 for 60 seconds.
3. [u]Escort's Phoenix Aegis[/u] - Increases the target's armor by 80 and fire resistance by 25% for 60 seconds.
4. [u]Escort's Wintry Aegis[/u] - Increases the target's armor by 80 and frost resistance by 25% for 60 seconds.
5. [u]Escort's Thunder Aegis[/u] - Increases the target's armor by 80 and shock resistance by 25% for 60 seconds.

NOT YET TESTED.

[b]Mod #2 - [i]Padded Roughspun Tunic[/i][/b]

Requested by P210. Adds the "Roughspun Tunic, Padded" into the smithing menu, where you can craft it. It is also upgradeable at the workbenches and can be enchanted. Slightly lighter, less protective, and less costly than hide armor.

[b]Mod #3 - [i]Padded Gloves[/i][/b]

Requested by P210. Adds the Padded Gloves into the smithing menu, where you can craft it. It is also upgradeable at the workbenches and can be enchanted. Slightly lighter, less protective, and less costly than hide armor.

[b]Mod #4 - [i]Ultra Konahrik Mask[/i][/b]

Requested by daventry. Gives the abilities of all the other dragon priest masks (except for the wooden mask) to the Konahrik mask. The Konahrik mask is still obtained as normal in vanilla Skyrim.

_____________

[b][u]OTHER MODS BY ME[/u]:[/b]

Al's Completionist Series:
1. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9994]Al's Treasure Vault[/url] -- [i]Now you have a place to store all your gold and have it display as treasure![/i]
2. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30633]Als Paragon Reward Chest[/url] -- [i]little mod rewarding the completionist player who collects all 5 Paragons[/i]
3. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30643]Als Konahrik[/url] -- [i]little mod rewarding the completionist player who collects all vanilla dragon priest masks with a previously missing boss fight[/i]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12859]Al's Thunder Smite[/url] -- [i]Insta-Kill Enemies, and ONLY Enemies[/i]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25824]Al's Elsweyr Rift[/url] -- [i]Teleport to and from a one stop shop for selling loot and crafting items from anywhere![/i]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19697]Al's Three Stone Watch[/url] -- [i]Lore friendly, non-cheaty, humble starter home[/i]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24486[/url]Al's Eclipse Bloodcurse[/url] -- [i]Tired of shooting arrows at the sun? Now you can get a true eclipse (including removed sun damage) as a power[/i]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13121]Al's Dead Dragon Giant Camp[/url] -- [i]Just as dragon lairs and giant camps are quick and easy (relatively) stops for a rich haul, so is this![/i]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7444]Al's Starry Armor and Clothing Retextures[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7648]Al's Virility - Nude Male - PC Only (Adult Content; NSFW)[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13355]Al's -Get 80 Perk Points and All Skills 100- Cheat Ring[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7728]Al's "Nothing Sells for Zero Gold" Tweak[/url] -- [i]I bet you're tired of picking up loot that sells for nothing. So am I[/i]
author: AlCiao
